xuiWizardDialogService
service in module xui

Description

Service that provides a dialog with Wizard functionality.

Methods

  • show(options)

    Displays a modal dialog with the supplied Wizard template.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    optionsIWizardDialogOptions

    Options for configuring the dialog.

    Returns
    ng.IPromise<boolean>

    dialogResult

  • showModal(options)

    Displays a modal dialog with the supplied Wizard template and viewModel.

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    optionsIWizardDialogOptions

    Presentation and interaction settings.

    Returns
    ng.IPromise<any>
